twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Enable two-factor authentication for additional protection of your account

emailConfirmation.title: Email Confirmation
emailConfirmation.info: With email confirmation enabled, each withdrawal operation will require confirmation via a code sent to your email. This is an additional level of protection for your funds.
emailConfirmation.recommendation: It is recommended to keep email confirmation enabled for maximum security

withdrawalLimits.title: Withdrawal Cooldown Period
withdrawalLimits.description: The cooldown period between withdrawals helps protect your funds from unauthorized access. After each withdrawal, you must wait the specified time before your next operation.
